includeExecutionData.description: Determines whether execution data is included in your log. When set to `false`, data is excluded.

level.description: Defines which category of execution history events are logged. Valid values: `ALL`, `ERROR`, `FATAL`, `OFF`

logDestination.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of a CloudWatch log group. Make sure the State Machine has the correct IAM policies for logging. The ARN must end with `:*`
